bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition brought about by wind and heat. Su wen 素問 71: 岐伯曰：風温春化同，熱曛昏火 夏化同 , “Qi Bo: Wind and warmth agree with the transformations [evoked by] spring. Heat, the red-yellow [color of] dusk, and fire agree with the transformations [evoked by] summer”. Feng wu 風忤 , wind hostility [1]

Pathological Condition identical with ke wu 客忤 , visitor’s hostility. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry jiu 韭 quoting Jin gui yao lue 金匱要略 : 卒死客忤 , “Sudden [appearance of] death because of a visitor’s hostility”, writes: 風忤邪惡 , “ Wind hostility , evil and malign [qi]”.
